info.title: SubscriptionCreationClient
info.description: Subscription creation client provides an interface to create, modify and retrieve azure subscriptions programmatically.

get.description: Retrieves the status of the subscription definition POST operation. The URI of this API is returned in the Location field of the response header.

202.description: Accepted. Subscription update is in progress.

Location.description: The URL where the status of the asynchronous operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

200.description: Successful completion of the asynchronous operation

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: The operation ID, which can be found from the Location field in the generate recommendation response header.

get.description: Lists all of the available pending Microsoft.Subscription API operations.

200.description: Normal response for a successful query. The response body will contain the data that matches the filters specified in the query parameters.

202.description: Accepted. Subscription creation is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Uri path corresponding to commercial subscription or legacy subscription

Owners.description: An array of Active Directory Principals

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

AdPrincipal.description: Active Directory Principal for subscription creation delegated permission

OperationListResult.description: status of the subscription POST operation.

SubscriptionOperation.description: status of the subscription POST operation.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2015-06-01
